thread.section_title: ZipRecruiter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ZipRecruiter | ziprecruiter.com | 2 of 199
thread.title: Lisa Gordon

author: Lisa Gordon
title: Lisa Gordon
text: I have a women's clothing boutique and this is the first time I used ZipRecruiter. WOW very impressed with their program and format. I called customer service unsure about some of the features and talked with Rebecca. She really knows the system and how it functions . Rebecca walked me through the yes and no questions also explained the importance of using the skill keyword box will that will target the candidates that I actually need for my position. ZipRecruiter is MUCH MUCH more than a place to post your help wanted ad. You really should call Rebecca at customer service to walk you through your postings it's amazing!
